Saves the current model state.

Parameters:

  • checkpoint_path (str) – directory path to store the checkpoint to

  • exist_ok (bool (Default value = False)) – whether to overwrite the existing checkpoint path

Loads a model state from a saved checkpoint.

Parameters:

checkpoint_path (str) – directory path to load the checkpoint from

Model dictionary

save_buffer(checkpoint_path: str)¶

Saves the buffer. By default, we assume the buffer is fixed, thus nothing will be saved.

Parameters:

checkpoint_path (str) – directory path to store the buffer to

class jaxl.learners.learner.OfflineLearner(config: SimpleNamespace, model_config: SimpleNamespace, optimizer_config: SimpleNamespace)¶

Bases: Learner

Offline learner class that extends the Learner class. Offline learner assumes the buffer to be fixed and has no interaction with any environments.

class jaxl.learners.learner.OnlineLearner(config: SimpleNamespace, model_config: SimpleNamespace, optimizer_config: SimpleNamespace)¶

Bases: Learner

Online learner class that extends the Learner class. Online learner assumes the buffer to be changing and interacts with an environment.

property env¶

Environment.

save_buffer(checkpoint_path: str)¶

Saves the buffer.

Parameters:

checkpoint_path (str) – directory path to store the buffer to

jaxl.learners.reinforcement module¶

class jaxl.learners.reinforcement.OnPolicyLearner(config: SimpleNamespace, model_config: SimpleNamespace, optimizer_config: SimpleNamespace)¶

Bases: ReinforcementLearner

On-policy learner class that extends the ReinforcementLearner class. This is the general learner for on-policy reinforcement learning agents.

checkpoint(checkpoint_path: str, exist_ok: bool = False)¶

Saves the current model state.

Parameters:

  • checkpoint_path (str) – directory path to store the checkpoint to

  • exist_ok (bool (Default value = False)) – whether to overwrite the existing checkpoint path

class jaxl.learners.reinforcement.ReinforcementLearner(config: SimpleNamespace, model_config: SimpleNamespace, optimizer_config: SimpleNamespace)¶

Bases: OnlineLearner

Reinforcement learner class that extends the OnlineLearner class. This is the general learner for reinforcement learning agents.

checkpoint(checkpoint_path: str, exist_ok: bool = False)¶

Saves the current model state.

Parameters:

  • checkpoint_path (str) – directory path to store the checkpoint to

  • exist_ok (bool (Default value = False)) – whether to overwrite the existing checkpoint path

Logs the running statistics of observations and value estimate.

Parameters:

aux (Dict[str, Any]) – the auxiliary dictionary to put the runnint statistics into

the auxiliary dictionary with running statistics

The frequency to perform model update after environment steps.

update_obs_rms_and_normalize(obss: Array | ndarray | bool_ | number, lengths: Array | ndarray | bool_ | number) → Array | ndarray | bool_ | number¶

Updates the running statistics for observations and normalize the observations. If the observations are stacked with previous timesteps, then update using only the current timestep.

Parameters:

  • obss (chex.Array) – the observations for updating the statistics

  • lengths (chex.Array) – the lengths of each observation sequence

Returns:

the normalized observations

Return type:

chex.Array

update_value_rms_and_normalize(rets: Array | ndarray | bool_ | number) → Array | ndarray | bool_ | number¶

Updates the running statistics for value estimate and normalize the returns.

Parameters:

rets (chex.Array) – the returns for updating the statistics

Returns:

the normalized returns

Return type:

chex.Array

property val_rms¶

Running statistics for value estimates.

jaxl.learners.supervised module¶

class jaxl.learners.supervised.SupervisedLearner(config: SimpleNamespace, model_config: SimpleNamespace, optimizer_config: SimpleNamespace)¶

Bases: OfflineLearner

Supervised learner class that extends the OfflineLearner class. This is the general learner for supervised learning agents.
